mapper.select: select u.id as id, a.id as account_id, a.username as account_username, a.password as account_password, a.phoneNumber as account_phoneNumber, a.point as account_point, a.remainTime as account_remainTime, u.startDate as startDate, u.endDate as endDate from usageCommutationTicket as u join account as a on u.account_id = a.id where u.id = #{id};
